top_contaminated_domains_count.png.title: Top Contaminated Domains in SQuAD
top_contaminated_domains_count.png.description: Bar chart showing the domains with the highest number of contaminated instances found. The height of each bar represents the number of contaminated matches detected for each domain. This helps identify which domains contain the most contaminated content.
key_insights: Domain with most contaminated instances: rajpurkar.github.io (967 instances)
Total contaminated instances across top domains: 1,512

rank_distribution_analysis.png.title: Rank Distribution Analysis
rank_distribution_analysis.png.description: Combined histogram showing the distribution of ranks at which question contamination (blue) and Q&A contamination (orange) were detected. The dashed lines indicate the mean ranks. This visualization helps compare how early in the retrieval process different types of contamination are typically found.
key_insights: Q&A instances found at rank 1: 103 instances

source_category_analysis.png.title: Contaminated Sources by Category in SQuAD
source_category_analysis.png.description: Bar chart showing the number of contaminated sources found in each source category. The height represents the count of contaminated sources, and the text shows the exact number. This helps identify which types of sources contain the most contaminated content.
key_insights: Category with most contaminated sources: other (1,564 sources)
Category with least contaminated sources: ecommerce (1 sources)
Total contaminated sources across all categories: 1,940

efficiency_metrics.png.title: Efficiency Metrics
efficiency_metrics.png.description: Bar chart showing efficiency metrics including the full content fetch rate, Tier 1 efficiency, and Tier 3 usage rate. This helps understand the performance characteristics of the detection system.

top_answer_contamination_sources.png.title: Top Sources for Answer Contamination
top_answer_contamination_sources.png.description: Horizontal bar chart showing the top domains that were sources for answer contamination. This helps identify which domains are most likely to contain answer contamination.
key_insights: Top answer contamination source: rajpurkar.github.io (1984 contaminated answers)
Total contaminated answers across all sources: 2381
